TopicTitle: I accidentally fired Valentina/Bob and Bill are K.I.A.!

Articles.Content:
Hey, I accidentally fired Valentina Kerman kicking some Kerbals out. I didn't realize and when I went back to the astronaut complex she wasn't in the recruits! Any way to splice her back into the persistent.sfs file?

(Also, Bob and Jeb are dead and setting their state 0 does nothing. Anyone know how to save them? They are K.I.A. and not Missing.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-12T23:17:30Z" title="05/12/2015 11:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 12, 2015</time> by ExplodingRocketShips**
Wierd, I didn't think the origional 4 were fireable.
Well, there was big Xs, so obviously they were.

The last time I looked at the persistence file, they are all still there. All you have to do is change the status. You can look at an available kerbal who isn't on a mission to make sure you have the format right.
